name: Cards & Prizes
description:
"Cards & Prizes" is a  mobile game in which you may win prizes (currently 100€) !
The game is:
- Free
- Casual
- Instant notification upon winning
- simple
- not time consuming
- literally about drawing and flipping cards & if they match the winning cards you WIN! <3

For more info + download:
Google Play Store: 
 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cards_and_prizes&pli=1
App walkthrough:
